page.title: 20STOCKLAND'S FRENCH EXCHANGE
page.content: Every year Stockland Primary School's top class go over on an exchange to France. They stay in the town of { {MEZIDON_CANON}in the North of France near CAEN. They spend four days staying in a French home.In this time they go out with their family and with the school. This year they visited the Bayeux Tapestry.The French pupils then come to England and stay with an English family.This year they all visited the Roman Baths at Bath.{ MEZIDON_CANON is twinned with Honiton, a town not far from Stockland, which also does an exchange. Claire Parris,11.
